description: Abstract scheduler is really not meant to be used directly.  Logic for minimum ram checks should be removed and left up to subclasses like LeastCost or implemented by host_filter rules.  The ram check is actually already duplicated in InstanceTypeFilter.
title: minimum ram checks should be removed from AbstractScheduler and left up to subclasses
